transformerlab/transformerlab-app

open source app to run, train, and tune large language models on your computer

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • cheatsheet and study guide for transformers and large language models
  • Nanotron: minimalistic library for pretraining transformer models with simple API and scalable parallelism
  • litgpt: tools to train, finetune, and run large language models from the command line
  • transformers library for working with machine learning models
  • toolkit for finetuning large language models like Llama and Mistral on your own machine
  • library for post-training and fine-tuning transformer models with SFT, PPO, DPO, and more
  • Runs large language models on iOS and macOS
  • AI multilingual speech recognition, translation, dubbing web app
  • builds a transformer-based language model from scratch in Rust
  • Toolkit for fine-tuning and training large language and vision models
